text: Marian Cristinel Șerban (born 7 July 2000) is a Romanian professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for Academica Clinceni, on loan from CS Universitatea Craiova. == Career Statistics == === Club === {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |+ ! rowspan="2" |Club ! rowspan="2" |Season ! colspan="2" |League ! colspan="2" |Cup ! colspan="2" |Europe ! colspan="2" |Other ! colspan="2" |Total |- !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals |- |CSU Craiova |2019–20 |1 |0 |0 |0 | colspan="2" |– | colspan="2" |– |1 |0 |- | rowspan="3" |CS Mioveni (loan) |2018–19 |13 |1 |0 |0 | colspan="2" |– | colspan="2" |– |13 |1 |- |2019–20 |21 |0 |2 |0 | colspan="2" |– |2 |0 |25 |0 |- !Total !34 !1 !2 !0 !0 !0 !2 !0 !38 !1 |- |Academica Clinceni (loan) |2020–21 |2 |1 |0 |0 | colspan="2" |– | colspan="2" |– |2 |1 |- ! colspan="2" |Career Total !37 !2 !2 !0 !0 !0 !2 !0 !41 !2 |} ==References== ==External links== * * Marian Șerban at lpf.ro Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Craiova Category:Romanian footballers Category:Romania youth international footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Liga I players Category:CS Universitatea Craiova players Category:FC Academica Clinceni players Category:Liga II players Category:CS Mioveni players
